phrase.item: There is no life without friends and enemies, why are you sorrowful?
There is no life without flowers and enemies, why are you sorrowful?
There is no life without dying and death, why are you sorrowful?
Since life is going fast, don't be sorrowful, do not care.
Life doesn't stay in one place, it's always moving, oh gorgeous one,
Life is very unfaithful, but you are still young, oh gorgeous one,
Everyone has ??? nowadays, oh gorgeous one.
Since life is going fast, don't be sorrowful, do not care.
Why should we give each other a hard time, in this life of springtime?
Why we are going deeper into sorrow, in this life of springtime?
Whatever is in our fate, we will see [face] it, in this life of springtime.
Since life is going fast, don't be sorrowful, do not care.
We are in a time of young life, a time of desire and longing,
In life, oh Saodatsho, young life is just [like] a breath,
Now appreciate your time, it is not going to come back.
Since life is going fast, don't be sorrowful, do not care.
